TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UploadFileCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的实例传递给。Instances of this class are passed to the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以异步方式上载文件。The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading a file. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#4)] 上载完成时调用以下方法。The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As Byte()
public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Result { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取通过调用 方法启动的数据上载操作的服务器回复。

span.span: Gets the server reply to a data upload operation that is started by calling an method.

value.span: 一个包含服务器回复的 数组。

span.span: A array that contains the server reply.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应检查和属性来确定是否已完成上载。You should check the and properties to determine whether the upload completed. 如果属性的值是对象或属性的值是`true`，未正确完成异步操作和属性的值将无效。If the property's value is an object or the property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the property's value will not be valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#5)]
